meanings.definition: A system or organization in which people or groups are ranked one above the other according to status or authority.
meanings.sent1: In the school's hierarchy, the principal is at the top.
meanings.sent2: The company's hierarchy determines who reports to whom.
meanings.sent3: At the animal shelter, the cat's hierarchy seemed to involve who got the sunniest spot.
meanings.sent4: The hierarchy of power in the jungle is clear: the lion is king.
meanings.sent5: The hierarchy of needs places food and shelter at the base.

meanings.definition: Any system of persons or things ranked one above another.
meanings.sent1: The hierarchy of colors in the rainbow is fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The military operates on a strict hierarchy.
meanings.sent3: In the garden, the flowers seemed to have their own hierarchy based on size.
meanings.sent4: The hierarchy of books on the shelf showed the owner's preferences.
meanings.sent5: The hierarchy of sizes in the nesting dolls was intriguing to the child.
